name: jasmin-log-dev
postCreateCommand: /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install -U autopep8; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade build; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade twine; echo "alias build='rm -rf dist/*; python3 -m build'; alias push='python3 -m twine upload -u __token__ -p \$PYPI_TOKEN dist/*'; export PYPI_TOKEN=pypi-AgEIcHlwaS5vcmcCJDQ3YTYzZmM1LWJiNGItNDMwNC1iMjlhLTViYzQxOTJlZjNlMQACG1sxLFsiamFzbWluLW1vbmdvLWxvZ2dlciJdXQACLFsyLFsiYjRiZjExNzUtNjhmMi00ZWFmLWI0YWUtOThiMDY5NmYzNzAwIl1dAAAGIE79egf_sHwVuUEufGDOCR-C1oHWitmzkFQnxgwWxhrV" > ~/.bashrc
